summary: Inventory age metrics showing improvement but pricing strategy needs adjustment.

opportunities.title: Enhance Website Lead Follow-up Process
opportunities.description: Website leads show 15% higher conversion when initial response is under 30 minutes
opportunities.potentialImpact: $83,500 in additional gross profit based on current traffic
actionSteps: Create dedicated website lead specialist position
Develop tailored follow-up templates by vehicle category

opportunities.title: Optimize Used Vehicle Inventory
opportunities.description: Current aged inventory (>30 days) is 23% above optimal levels
actionSteps: Price adjustment on 14 identified slow-moving units
Transfer 8 units to sister store with higher demand profile
Adjust purchasing strategy based on turn rate analysis

riskAreas.title: Rising Floor Plan Costs
riskAreas.description: Floor plan interest expense increased 18% due to aged inventory and higher rates
riskAreas.mitigationStrategy: Implement 45-day inventory turn target and weekly aging review

strategicRecommendations: Implement dedicated BDC team structure with specialized roles for website, phone, and follow-up
Create omnichannel customer experience to improve seamless transitions between digital and in-store
